Name: Cyber Gun
About the game: Have you ever been so lonely that no one but yourself could save you from complete self-destruction? This game is just about that! Cyber Gun is a hardcore first-person shooter with platformer elements. Features: • Challenging levels that will make you pass them again and again • Neon cyberpunk atmosphere • Lots of interesting mechanics that make the gameplay more interesting: time dilation, jerks and much more • Beautiful graphics
Meta Title: Cyber Gun: Apr 23, 2019, Semyon Maximov and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cyber Gun? Check out the release date (Apr 23, 2019), developer insights from Semyon Maximov, and a complete game summary.
